Syntactically Awesome Style Sheets

SASS is preprocessor for CSS

Which allow writing less code in more condense way

CSS Code

                            
                                    
Child Selecting

    .parent {
        display: flex;
        justify-content: center;
        align-items: center;
        padding: 1.2em;
    }

    .parent .child {
        align-self: flex-start;
    }
                           
    .child button {
        padding: 1.1em 2.2em;
    }

SASS Code

                            
                                    
Nesting Feature

    .parent {
        display: flex;
        justify-content: center;
        align-items: center;
        padding: 1.2em;
        .child {
            align-self: flex-start;
            button {
                padding: 1.1em 2.2em;
        }
    }
